Modular battery: Incorporate easily replaceable batteries for more sustainable product life cycle and cost-effective upgrades.
Water-resistant: Design waterproof or water-resistant phone cases that protect against water immersion and prolong device longevity.
Enhanced privacy features: Implement additional privacy controls, such as an automatic data-locking mode for security while at certain locations or on public WiFi.
Long-lasting screen: Use power-saving technology such as reduced blue light emission, allowing for a low-glare, healthier screen and better battery life.
Personalized AR/VR experiences: Utilize augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) to create unique, interactive experiences that improve mobile gaming, entertainment, and learning.
